page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: On Wednesday I got up at 6am. I had my breakfast, Weetabix and toast, and got dressed. I took my dog out for a walk and tidied my room when I came in. At 8.30am I set off for school and met my pal on the way. Registration is at 9am and the first lesson starts at 9.05am, Maths on Wednesdays. Each period lasts 1 hour and I have 3 classes in the morning and 2 in the afternoon with lunch in between from 12.25 - 1.15pm.I bought my lunch at the shop across from the school. I don't like school dinners. On my way home in the evening I went into Glenburn Library and borrowed a book about 'The Hardy Boys',a detective mystery. After I got changed I cut the grass in the garden and I got 50p for doing it. After tea at 5.30pm I went out to play on my bike. I went to bed at 10.30pm.
